repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:latest 

MAINTAINER Bj√∂rn Heneka <bheneka@codebee.de> 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y rsync vim cron && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD backup.sh /backup.sh 
ADD backup_jenkins /etc/cron.d/backup_jenkins 

RUN chmod 0644 /etc/cron.d/backup_jenkins && \  
touch /var/log/cron.log 

CMD cron && tail -f /var/log/cron.log
